entry.value:
[{"id":"dev-17370","entityId":"86-22816","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Calendar][Resource view] Resources are not all shown for every user even though connected to offers"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Aline Morgenstern"},{"name":"created","value":"1581436611412"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17370"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
resources affectedInflate, Sprungbereich
Account emailinfo@maxxarena.de
Supplier ID18047
Novomind Ticket ID81170
Environmentall browsers

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Log in to bernhard@maxxarena.com

  2. Go to resource manager and check number of resources. There are 6 resources.
    ->

  3. Check if all resources are connected to offers.
    -> all resources are connected to offers

  4. Go to Calendar > Resource view

Actual result:

Some users of this supplier ID cannot see some of the resources in resource view while others can see all of them.

Userresource not shown
info@maxxarena.de-
adam@estermanns.com-
bernhard@maxxarena.comInflate
christina@estermanns.com-
daniel@estermanns.com-
franziska@estermanns.comInflate
herbert@estermanns.com-
julian@estermanns.com-
layla@estermanns.com-
marinus@estermanns.comSprungbereich
rico@clubdrei.com-
simone@estermanns.com-
staff@maxxarena.com-
vivian@estermanns.com-

example info@maxxarena.de where everything works

example bernhard@maxxarena.com where the resource "Inflate" is not shown

Info: we tried to reproduce but weren't able to reproduce on other accounts.
Missing resources can still be accessed manually via filter.
After adding all resources to filter, and afterwards delete one resource from filter, resource "Inflatable" is shown in resource table (see Screencast)

Expected result:

All resources should be shown per default in resource view in all user accounts when they are connected to at least one offer. E.g.

worker"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Oleksandr Ivashchenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1582118504391"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17414"},{"name":"description","value":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582282139339,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
